availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth Hord Wright on January 13, 1842. Father of James B. Wright, Jane Wright, and John Wright. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #817883, p.365
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 65B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District, p. 326
Find A Grave, "Crittenden Wright (1820-1909)," Memorial #13524759, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13524759 (accessed February 20, 2019).
